sentences.en: He found he could no longer cope with his demanding job.
sentences.cn: 他发现自己已无力应对那份劳神费力的工作了。

sentences.en: I no longer have any objection to your going to see her.
sentences.cn: 我不会再因为你去见她而不高兴。

sentences.en: I noticed that he wasn't sitting by the door any longer.
sentences.cn: 我注意到他已经不再坐在门边了。

sentences.en: If you build more plastics into cars, the car lasts longer.
sentences.cn: 如果汽车采用更多塑料元件，寿命会更长一些。

sentences.en: People live longer nowadays, and they are better educated.
sentences.cn: 当今，人们越来越长寿，受教育程度也提高了。

sentences.en: She can no longer tolerate the position that she's in.
sentences.cn: 她再也受不了自己的处境了.

sentences.en: She was devoted to him, but she no longer loved him madly.
sentences.cn: 她一心一意地爱他，但是这份爱不再疯狂。

sentences.en: The article was abstracted from a longer new book.
sentences.cn: 这篇文章是从一本较长的新书中摘选出来的。

sentences.en: The construction industry is no longer as depressed as it was.
sentences.cn: 建筑业不再像以往那样萧条了。

sentences.en: The longer your child can go without needing a filling, the better.
sentences.cn: 孩子越晚需要补牙就越好。

sentences.en: The queue for places at the school has never been longer.
sentences.cn: 排队申请上这所学校的人数达到历史最高峰。

sentences.en: The spade and fork have longer shafts, providing better leverage.
sentences.cn: 锹和耙的手柄较长，可发挥较好的杠杆作用。

sentences.en: The waste is safely locked away until it is no longer radioactive.
sentences.cn: 废料被安全储存起来，直到其不再有辐射性。

sentences.en: They are no longer part of a duopoly on overseas routes.
sentences.cn: 他们不再是垄断海外航线的两强之一。

sentences.en: They told James he could no longer live rent-free.
sentences.cn: 他们告诉詹姆斯他不能再白住了。

sentences.en: Women are no longer dominated by the men in their relationships.
sentences.cn: 在两性关系中女性不再受制于男性。

trans.tran_cn: 比较久的，（距离，长度）长的( long的比较级 )，长时间的，（因忙或不愉快等）似乎比实际时间长的，长音的
